eveHQMessage.title: New ships, citadel fitting and T3 cruisers subsystems update with hotfix
eveHQMessage.message:
Hot fix for wrong CPU and PWG bonuses for some T3 subsystems.

New ships, citadel fitting and T3 cruisers subsystems update

This update made by the new maintainer of EveHQ - Mike Eshva. It should work but please excuse me if I made something wrong for the first time.

I've added new ships: Chemosh, Dagon, Molok, Pacifier and Enforcer. As well I've changed T3 cruisers subsystems to 2017 July patch. Old fittings can't be upgraded. Sorry.

As well beta citadel fitting and citadel assets retrieval brought by paulkpeterson.

In depth post

Please report bugs on our Forum (bugs reports section)

Join us on : Twitter | Facebook | Google+ | Website
